title: Film Antonioniego Powiekszenie
description: Poster with white border. Large central image of a person's face made in an oversized halftone print pattern in blue, red, yellow and white. White text with black outline in center at bottom reads: "Grand Prix/ NA MFF w Cannes." Black text below white text reads: "Film Antonioniego/ POWIEKSZENIE/ Zdjecia: Carlo Di Palma/ w Rolach Glownych:/ D. Hemmings, V. Redgrave/ Prod. C. Ponti, Bridge Film /Anglia/"
name: Poster
